reviews.review:
If you play as a Killer you will get T BAG 
If you play as a Survivor you will get Face Camped 
But still its a best game never gets bored of it specially if you are a toxic flash light saver

This game is so much fun

The Salty Survivors and their made up rules
The Fun Killers you face with all different sets to their kit
Great fun with or without friends
Always an interesting time regardless who you play

I highly recommend this game to anyone who enjoys a little bit of everything in a game or just wanna make some poor survivors cry

Super fun, especially with a group

I have played this game for years, had fun, gotten tilted, on both survivor side and killer. I've uninstalled in a rage over countless bugs and questionable balance choices, but I keep coming back for the enjoyable evening it often brings me with my friends. That is, untill the most recent update switched the "accept" and "reject" buttons on party invites from friends. This ridiculous, unwarranted change has forced my muscle memory to reject several invites and that's more frustrating than the one hook mori from a facecamping Freddy. 0/10 don't buy.
I am literally addicted to this game. It's challenging and fun all at the same time.
Polecam wszystkim masochistom. Uwaga jak raz wejdziesz to nigdy nie wyjdziesz
This game is great, but the devs like to do questionable things all the time. But this game will be the most addicting game that you'll hate. Trust me lmao
A really good game with a friend to play at night

10/10 juego para insultar randoms por cosas que pudiste haber hecho mejor pero que no hiciste por tu poca capacidad dentro del juego pero que te niegas a aceptar.

Te haces main asesino y puedes ser un streamer toxico con 10 espectadores promedio y si te va mal en la partida puedes echarle la culpa a los jugadores de hacer stream sniping.

Te haces main superviviente y le haces bullying a los asesinos y porque eres toxico insultas al asesino aunque hayas ganado la partida y el asesino haya sido un buen jugador tanto en habilidad como en actitud..
las ultimas mejoras en cuanto a la jubalidad como graficos aumentaron el disfrute del juego, les recomiendo el juego para pasar el rato o jugar con amigos es bien entretenido

I've only played for a short time, have hit just about every check on the Baby Dwight/Baby Killer list. Had several randoms disconnect over the course of my career. Only had one remotely toxic post-game chat. I fully expect more of both in the future. But you know, I really like this game. I would recommend it, toxicity or not.
